long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a better interface for searching the browser history and addresses the limitations of the default history viewer. It lets you search by title or URL and optionally specify the visit count or set a date range. You can set as many search terms as you want for more precise filtering. You can also specify terms to exclude from search results and you can specify whether you want to search in the page title or URL.
